trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible key values on a keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 指定键盘上可能的键值。

trans-unit.source: Information pertaining to key input can be obtained in several different ways in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 可以在几种不同方式中获取信息的键输入与相关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Key-related events, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>, provide key state information through the ventArgs object that is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 密钥相关的事件，如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>，提供通过 ventArgs 对象传递给事件处理程序的键的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Key state information can also be obtained through the static methods on the oard class, such as oard.IsKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.Key) and oard.GetKeyStates(System.Windows.Input.Key).
trans-unit.target: 此外可以通过 oard 类，如 oard 上的静态方法获取键的状态信息。IsKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.Key) 和 oard。GetKeyStates(System.Windows.Input.Key)。

trans-unit.source: The oard class reports the current state of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Oard 类报告键盘的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The key is used with another key to create a single combined character.
trans-unit.target: 该键与另一个键配合使用，用于创建单一的组合字符。

trans-unit.source: A special key masking the real key being processed by an IME.
trans-unit.target: 用于屏蔽 IME 正在处理的真实键的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: The left Windows logo key (Microsoft Natural Keyboard).
trans-unit.target: 左 Windows 徽标键 (Microsoft Natural Keyboard)。

trans-unit.source: A constant reserved for future use.
The 0 key on the numeric keypad.
The 1 key on the numeric keypad.
The 2 key on the numeric keypad.
The 3 key on the numeric keypad.
The 4 key on the numeric keypad.
The 5 key on the numeric keypad.
The 6 key on the numeric keypad.
The 7 key on the numeric keypad.
The 8 key on the numeric keypad.
The 9 key on the numeric keypad.
The right Windows logo key (Microsoft Natural Keyboard).
trans-unit.target: 右 Windows 徽标键 (Microsoft Natural Keyboard)。

trans-unit.source: A special key masking the real key being processed as a system key.
trans-unit.target: 用于屏蔽作为系统键处理的真实键的特殊键。
